Articles.Content:
Thanks for this awesome game!

Greetings from Spain and keep on that good work

Excuse me about my poor english :X
Welcome to the forum, and your English is just fine.

Hola and don't worry, your English sounds good! And especially if you've got questions/problems with something in the game, pictures are worth a thousand words, so don't be afraid to ask if you need anything

Thank you!!

I am not too experience with forum procedures but I will try to do my best!

for example there is a picture...
